Uses of Package
org.jsimpledb.kv.util

  • Packages that use org.jsimpledb.kv.util 
    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb.kv.simple
    A simple in-memory implementation of the KVDatabase interface.
    org.jsimpledb.kv.sql
    KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
    org.jsimpledb.kv.util
    Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.util used by org.jsimpledb.kv.simple 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCountingKVStore
    KVStore support superclass that implements the encodeCounter(), decodeCounter(), and adjustCounter() methods.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.util used by org.jsimpledb.kv.sql 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCountingKVStore
    KVStore support superclass that implements the encodeCounter(), decodeCounter(), and adjustCounter() methods.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.util used by org.jsimpledb.kv.util 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCountingKVStore
    KVStore support superclass that implements the encodeCounter(), decodeCounter(), and adjustCounter() methods.
    AbstractKVNavigableMap
    NavigableMap support superclass for maps backed by keys and values encoded as byte[] keys and values in a KVStore, and whose key sort order is consistent with the byte[] key encoding.
    AbstractKVNavigableSet
    NavigableSet support superclass for sets backed by elements encoded as byte[] keys in a KVStore and whose sort order is consistent with their byte[] key encoding.
    LockManager.LockResult
    Possible return values from LockManager.lock().
    LockOwner
    Represents the owner of a Lock managed by a LockManager.
